name: Orbed Cube
description:
For Global Game Jam 2022 (also Frick NFTs)
Made with Quest 2 via link

idk why i called it that

no sounds :(

also my first vr game

Controls:

Joystick to teleport and rotate
Trigger to spawn orbs
Grip to grab cube
Primary Button to Link two grabbed cubes

Draw a circle and release the triggers to spawn the orb, which does 3 things:
Touch with white orbed wand (Yin) to destroy surrounding orbs
Touch with black orbed wand (Yang) to create a new cube
Touch with a cube to toggle its state

Get through all the doors to win
To open a door, make all particles blue
